titles.title: To authorize the President to award the Medal of Honor to E. Royce Williams for acts of valor during the Korean War.
To authorize the President to award the Medal of Honor to E. Royce Williams for acts of valor during the Korean War.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This bill authorizes the President to award the Medal of Honor to E. Royce Williams for acts of valor as a lieutenant in the Navy, on November 18, 1952.
